items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful sweater
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater! It’s soft, warm, incredible quality and absolutely beautiful! I highly recommend this! For reference I am 5’3” 120 pounds I ordered a Medium and it comfortably fit with double layers underneath for chilly Michigan Fall Photos with my husband ❤️ Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Change out the buttons
items.body: The sweater os so cute! The only thing is the buttons on the sweater take away from the beauty of the sweater. They should be black or covered in string like the ribbons. The buttons are to casual for the sweater. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many compliments!
items.body: This is such a cute cardigan! I got so many compliments when I wore it recently. The material feels high quality and the style is adorable. I’m wearing it all through the holiday! Read more

items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommended..
items.body: ZESICA Fall Bow Cardigans are a trendy and versatile choice for the fall and winter seasons. This women's casual long sleeve cardigan features a stylish V-neck design, button-down closure, and charming bow details on the sleeves, adding a touch of elegance to your everyday look. I appreciate the high-quality, soft ribbed knit fabric used to craft this sweater, ensuring both comfort and durability. The loose fit and relaxed drop shoulders allow for easy layering and a comfortable range of motion throughout the day. This women's cardigan is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a fashionable and functional piece for the colder months. Its trendy design, quality materials, and versatile style make it an ideal option for creating a variety of chic and casual outfits, suitable for both everyday wear and special occasions. Overall, I highly recommend the ZESICA Fall Bow Cardigans for anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and well-made sweater for the fall and winter seasons. With its elegant design, high-quality materials, and trendy details, this cardigan is an excellent addition to any wardrobe. Read more
items.author: TAKILIGI

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Gray, Sand, White, Darkblue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
